alternate_dph wrote:
> I was trying to use a Heartburst attack against a Giant Skeleton and
> noticed it had no effect.  Is there some immunity?

Hmm.. Nothing in the source code to suggest an immunity. Are you sure it 
had absolutely no effect, like the skeleton's HP didn't decrease at all? 
Any chance that it was invulnerable?


-- Yan
